title: Science and the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/22
itunes:title: Science and the Paranormal - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/22
description:
George Noory and Brian Cano, host of "Paranormal Caught On Camera" on the Travel Channel, discuss his career as a paranormal investigator, and how he went from being a skeptic to a believer in the paranormal through his research.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
